name: Roulecca
info: An extremely lucky Sinner. Can deal 5% more Damage, and an extra 5% more for enemies with broken Cores.

media.title: JP Roulecca Character Trailer
media.author: 無期迷途 [むきめいと] ー公式ー

maniaIntensifyText: Roulecca is guaranteed to fire 1 [Lucky Bullet] every 6 attacks.
criminalRecord:
Demonstrated stubborn and petulant behavior. Initiated in total several dozen serial explosions and shootings in the name of //rising to the top of Syndicate//, causing several hundred casualties.

Frequenting all major casinos over the years, the subject's abnormally high winning rate and uninhibited character often attracted grudge. It's suspected that the subject asked for trouble intentionally and more violent incidents may result if the subject is not properly controlled.

--

Interactions and counseling with the subject reveal that she witnessed the murder of her father and his gang members at a young age, which awakened the power and she defended herself with it. Evidence shows that the victims of the serial explosions and shootout were all rival gang members and no civilians were harmed in the incident. With Chief's further counseling and company, the subject has gradually rectified her petulant character.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
Possesses eerily strong luck and will almost never get hit by fatal objects like bullets, knives, and explosives. Able to control the development of things according to her will. Uses a Colt Python revolver habitually and never misses a target without having to aim, relying solely on her special power.

+++* Awakening Signs
The first recorded energy fluctuation occurred during a fight between two gangs in Syndicate. During the fight, the subject was apparently severely shaken mentally and had an awakening triggered by an intense urge to revenge. More details are to be obtained in further interrogations.

+++* Corruption State
In early assessments, the subject was misdiagnosed due to the intense vengefulness unfitting for the age. It's now been confirmed that the subject's mental state is normal and no apparent signs of corruption have been detected. Blessed by the //strong luck//, the mutating speed is way slower than that in normal people to the point of almost negligible.
ecbFlavourText:
"Roulecca will always be the luckiest among us."
"You will survive... you will survive..."
interrogation1:
Roulecca's handcuffs have already fallen off by the time the Chief enters the interrogation room, a testament to the power of her Sinner ability. Nightingale had already provided the Chief with a few other notable examples from Roulecca's file, including that she survived an attack that killed the rest of her gang, the Four-Leaf Clovers. The file also mentions that Roulecca likes to play a game called "roulette," a clear analogue of Russian roulette, and attempts to do so with the Chief in lieu of the usual interrogation format. She agrees to answer a question truthfully for each shot the Chief survives as long as the Chief agrees to do the same for her. The Chief readily agrees, and thanks to Nightingale's warning, produces a rigged replica revolver modeled expertly after Roulecca's own. Having arrested Roulecca in close proximity to the Unclaimed Crypt, the Chief suspects Roulecca may be connected with the gangs that opposed The Legion. It becomes clear, however, that Roulecca is not, nor does she appear to be strongly aligned with The Homeless. Instead, she seems more interested in the gangs themselves and the source of their Mania weapons. On the fifth shot -- the Chief's turn -- Roulecca reveals that she smuggled her real gun into the interrogation room and swapped the two revolvers. The Chief survives despite the switch and Roulecca reveals her true intention: to take revenge on the gangs that killed her own. To ensure that she gains all the information she needs, she takes back the gun containing the sixth and fatal shot, puts the barrel to her temple, and fires. The bullet explodes in the chamber, injuring her only slightly, scattering a list of names associated with [[[Black Water]]] that the Chief had brought into the room. After the Chief lets slip that the names belong to suspicious individuals, Roulecca takes it and allows herself to be taken away by EMTs. With a solid lead on her next target, she promises to meet the Chief again in Syndicate.

She eventually got the list from you, anyway. Yous hould've realized this earlier. She approached you on purpose because you had something that she wanted. Her right hand is wounded. You should seize this chance and reinforce her room to prevent her from escaping the MBCC.
interrogation2:
After blowing her way out of her cell, Roulecca carves a warpath through Syndicate, killing most of the names on the list. The Chief leads Hecate and a squadron after her via the Shackles, her weak signal implying she is on the verge of death. In a last ditch effort to save their potential informants, the Chief and Hecate spread out to increase their odds. The Chief finds her first, and after she kills another one of their leads, attempts to persuade her to abandon her quest for revenge. Roulecca explains that she views her awakening as a direct result of watching her family members die in front of her; they are a reminder of what she has lost and all that she has left. As revenge is the only thing she has left to live for, she asks the Chief to allow her to continue. As she limps away, an injured gangster throws a bomb filled with poison gas at them. While the Chief manages to keep Roulecca from harm, they are injured in the explosion. Coupled with inhalation of noxious fumes, they quickly fall unconscious.

After quite some effort, you finally found an exhausted Roulecca. To save her, you took a shot for her that would've been fatal. Poisonous gas is everywhere in the air. You take off your coat and use it to cover Roulecca's mouth and nose. You will only have a chance to survive if she's alive too.
interrogation3:
In their dreams, the Chief sees Roulecca's final moments with her father: how he promised to gift her the revolver she had coveted for so long, how she stumbled out of the wardrobe into room full of her dead family, the revolver still in the hand of her father's corpse. When they awake, Nightingale informs them that it is the fifth day since the operation. Thanks to Roulecca managing to procure an antitoxin, they will recover in only a handful of days. After she leaves, the Chief goes to open the window, only to find Roulecca pressed against the glass outside. Roulecca has been visiting the Chief every day in recovery. The two have continued their earliier game, albeit with lower stakes -- Roulecca's lateness earns her a loss. She tells the Chief that when she played games with her family, she often feeling like the luckiest child in the world. The Chief asks if she's always had her luck, and Roulecca admits that her family spoiled her, that for many years, her "luck" was a lie told to make her feel even more loved. As she starts to get lost in her regrets, the Chief brings her back to reality, betting her that she will no longer take revenge alone. The two make a promise to take down the gangsters together, only to be interrupted a moment later by Nightingale, calling to inform the Chief that Roulecca has escaped from confinement. Exasperated, the Chief yells after Roulecca as she escapes out the window.

Roulecca has never lied to you. Her "good luck" is indeed a result of her "spoiling" family. However, here at the MBCC, you will spoil her no further. Instead, you will correct some of her bad habits. Except that... it is a bit difficult to actually get it done.
arrestRec1: During the investigation of a serial explosion case with unknown cause, the subject requested temporary protection from the MBCC. When the request was processed by the shelter, the subject's Sinner identity and past criminal records were unraveled and she was then kept under further restraint.
arrestRec2: The daughter of the boss of a small gang named //Four-leaf Clover//. Her mother died early, but she was doted on by her father and the gang members and had a happy childhood. Under the gang's protection, she possessed a certain degree of //luck// early on and was banned by gambling businesses and lottery booths.
arrestRec3: The subject insisted on calling herself the boss of the Four-leaf Clover and frequented the major casinos in Syndicate, beginning revenge missions targeting other gangs on her own.
arrestRec4: The Four-leaf Clover was indeed one of the many small gangs in Syndicate. It mainly focused on gambling business and rarely involved in violent activities. The gang was eliminated amid the expansion of other powers in Syndicate and all registered members are dead.
servingTerm1: A picky eater and crazy about candies, the subject shows mild symptoms of malnutrition. After joining the MBCC, the subject has gradually gotten a taste for the nutritionally balanced food provided by the logistics department, and her candy addiction has greatly lessened.
servingTerm2: There have been frequent explosions in the Bureau lately, and investigation shows that the subject enjoys igniting all kinds of explosives. So far, the power station, fuel storage, and kitchen have already suffered severe losses.
servingTerm3: Passionate about gathering Sinners within the MBCC to play games - any game of chance such as dice games, airplane chess, etc. Since the subject wins every time, the other Sinners are gradually losing interest in these games.
servingTerm4: Recently, the subject seems particularly fascinated by the Chief's office and engages in activities such as placing a whiteboard duster on the doorstop or changing the Chief's desktop background to a laughable character from a certain comedy, apparently hoping to attract the Chief's attention.
emotionCheck1:
[Roulecca is jumping around in your office.]

**Roulecca:** Chief, come on! Let’s play a game!

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** I don’t mind playing, but can you put away the revolver?
 * **Roulecca:** It's no fun without some stakes! Come on, Chief. Raise the stakes!
 * **Roulecca:** 😉😉😉

* **Prompt:** I’ll make it clear. I am not playing anything that has to do with luck.
 * **Roulecca:** Oh, come on… Why not? I don’t want this! Play with me! I want you to play with me!
 * **Roulecca:** 😖😖😖
emotionCheck2:
[Roulecca looks very upset.]

**Roulecca:** Sigh… All the clovers I find lately have three leaves, is Roulecca’s power wearing off?

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** But I thought all clovers have three leaves?
 * **Roulecca:** Humph. Chief, with your luck, you’ll never find a four-leaf clover your entire life!
 * **Roulecca:** 😫😫😫

* **Prompt:** I happen to have found a four-leaf clover badge. You can have it.
 * **Roulecca:** Wow! This is what I lost a few days ago! Thank you, Chief. I knew I was a lucky one.
 * **Roulecca:** 😘😘😘
supervision1:
++* ⚠ Participation Matters

//Roulecca is inviting you to play some games with her.//

**System Notifications:** You ranked second in the dice game with Roulecca.

* **Prompt:** Accept the participation award
supervision2:
++* ⚠ Too Lucky

//A winner announcement is being broadcast in the Bureau.//

**System Notifications:** Attention please. Attention please.
Congratulations to Roulecca on becoming the lucky Sinner who's the 9999th person to get locked in the Confinement Cell. The prize is three hundred Recreation Area tokens.

* **Prompt:** I'm surprised.

**Chief:** We have this prize?
supervision3:
++* ⚠⚠ Bomb Disposal Expert

//Field staff request Roulecca's remote participation in a bomb disposal operation.//

**System Notifications:** Chief, the field staff have found a time bomb on a mission and requested Roulecca to help them with bomb disposal remotely.

* **Prompt:** Approve

**Roulecca:** Huh? Do you need Roulecca for something?

**Roulecca:** Oh, a bomb disposal request. Try not to bother Roulecca for such a trivial thing next time.

**Roulecca:** Let me see... The device has a simple design.
Do this first, then that... Right, you can remove the outer shell like that.

**Roulecca:** Next, separate the two yellow pieces carefully... Be very careful. It's not Roulecca's fault if you make it blow up, hehe.

**Roulecca:** Alright, now the final step. The classic dilemma with the red and blue wires! Which of them should you cut to stop the timer? Trust your own luck!

* **Prompt:** Roulecca!

**Roulecca:** Don't be mad, Chief. Roulecca's decisions are also based on luck.

**Roulecca:** Well, this time around, if it's up to me, I'll pick the blue wire!

**Roulecca:** ...Or the red one?

* **Prompt:** Roulecca! Stop messing around!

**Roulecca:** Okay, okay. I was just joking. Have some sense of humor, guys.

**Roulecca:** There's a gray wire hidden behind the blue wire. Cut that one and you're good.

**System Notifications:** With Roulecca's instructions, the field staff finally render the explosive safe.

* **Prompt:** Luckily, it's safe now.
baseVoicelines:
[Obtain the Sinner]
You're pretty lucky to have caught Roulecca! Wanna bet with Roulecca on something?

[Raise to Phase 1]
Yay! Is today Roulecca's lucky day too?

[Raise to Phase 3]
Make a bigger bet. That's still not enough... Let's bet everyone's life on it!

[Level Start]
Let's go have some fun!

[Win Battles]
Roulecca wants an even more thrilling game!

[Lose Battles]
Lost? Roulecca lost?! Hahaha!

[Ultimate Skill]
Hahahahaha!

[Die in Battles]
Finally... You've come to pick me up...

[Greeting]
It's boring to be alone... Do you want to play a game with Roulecca?

[Conversation 1]
Roulecca's heard a .45 bullet takes only 0.45 seconds to pass through the brain. Hmmm... Who should Roulecca test it on?

[Conversation 2]
You know, Roulecca is a super famous assassin. Skills? Strategies? Intel? Come on. Only luckless suckers need those things. Once someone's in Roulecca's crosshairs, there's no escaping their fate!

[Conversation 3]
Growing up, Roulecca has never lost at any games. Roulecca doesn't need to cheat. Roulecca doesn't need to work hard either. Everyone just dotes on Roulecca——all the time. Right? Because you do too, don't you, Chief?

[Special Conversation 1]
Revenge is never Roulecca's purpose. Hehe, in fact, it's Roulecca's reason for living.

[Special Conversation 2]
Bombs, enemies, Black Water, cult followers, even those deadly monsters, Roulecca is not afraid of them! I'll dig out the truth behind everything.

[Special Conversation 3]
Don't forget that Roulecca has placed a huge bet on you. You can't lose your life to someone else so easily.

[Full Compliance]
Roulecca found another four-leaf clover! Hmm, with your terrible luck, Roulecca fears you'll never spot one in your whole life. Alright... Take this one. In return, play with Roulecca for a bit more.

[Idle]
Piapia, piapiapiapia!

[Annoyed]
You seem bored. Do you want to play a game with Roulecca? Why don't we——bet on this?

[Special Attention]
Wow, have you come to play with Roulecca?

[Dispatch]
Let's go!

[Dispatch Complete]
Roulecca is back! Roulecca didn't wander off this time.

[Level Up]
Eh? Roulecca can get even stronger?
attireVoicelines1:
[Attire Obtained]
Pew pew! Hehe, did I scare you, Chief? It's just a water gun! Come and play with Roulecca!

[Greeting]
Chief—Are you ready to game with Roulecca today? Whoever loses has to buy three melon popsicles!

[Ordinary Contact 1]
Roulecca loves to play on Eirene's big ship. The people there won't get angry even if I win a lot of things from them, and they always rush over to take pictures with me. They keep saying "the god of gambling is alive" and what not... I really don't understand them.

[Ordinary Contact 2]
Lucky—I won so many cakes today! I'm so happy! However, many others also gave Roulecca dessert before, but... who were they? Hmm... darn, Roulecca can't remember...

[Idle] 
Mmmm—what lovely weather! Chief, why don't you come and play something with me? Surfing, beachball—you name it! Roulecca is down with anything!

[Annoyed]
Haha... Chief, so itchy! Ahhh—Roulecca can't lose! 

[Special Attention] 
Chief... why do you keep staring at me? Is it because you like my shark doll, too? Hmph! This is Roulecca's hard-won prize! I won't lend it to you!

[Level Up}
Roulecca is going to win more ice cream!
attireVoicelines2:
[Attire Obtained]
Roulecca ate a strange cake this morning and turned into this. Um, Summer put it there on the table, I guess. It looked so delicious! I couldn't help myself... Hehe...

[Greeting]
Hide-and-seek? No, thank you. Don't assume I want to play such childish games just because Roulecca has become smaller, okay? Or, I have a better idea... How about I hide in your embrace?

[Ordinary Contact 1]
Aw... No snacks before bed? One bite, just one bite, okay? Roulecca is a lucky girl so I won't get tooth decay! I assure you!

[Ordinary Contact 2]
Hmmm... Roulecca is tired. Chief, can you get Roulecca some teddy bears? I want to hug them as I fall asleep, like when I was little...

[Idle] 
If I had been as strong back then as I am now, I would have been able to defeat them all even with this gun.

[Annoyed]
Do not treat Roulecca like a kid! Roulecca may be smaller now, but I am as clever as ever! Beating you will be as easy as pie. Take that! Pew pew pew pew pew!

[Special Attention] 
Hehe, doesn't this outfit look good on me, Chief? As one of my family, you should compliment me, too!

[Level Up}
I feel like I've grown taller again!
nightmareTalent: Gain 50 [Illusory Moon Coins] for each shop incident triggered.

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Lucky Survivor
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: The lower limit of [Lucky Bullets'] damage range is increased by 10%/15%/20%. [Lucky Roulette] becomes rapid fire of 6 [Lucky Bullets] (damage dealt by every bullet grows with the Ultimate's level).
exclusiveCrimebrand.flavourText:
"Roulecca will always be the luckiest among us."
"You will survive... you will survive..."

maniaIntensify.title: Fate's Gift
maniaIntensify.text: Roulecca is guaranteed to fire 1 [Lucky Bullet] every 6 attacks.

pros: Chance for Ult to reset after Ulting (S1)
cons: Ult's Crit cannot be affected by any external buffs

crimebrandSets.name: Broken Burst
crimebrandSets.note: Increase damage dealt to enemies that are corebroken.

crimebrandSets.name: Standard Damage
crimebrandSets.note: Standard damage set. Since Roulecca is under 155cm, she's able to get the extra Attack bonus from Pioneer.

crimebrandSets.name: Early Game
crimebrandSets.note: Early game alternative when you don't have anything better.

shackles.title: Royal Flush
shackles.description: [Lucky Roulette]: After casting, there is a 40% chance to reset the charge. This effect can be triggered every 6 seconds.

shackles.title: Push Your Luck
shackles.description: When the decrease damage taken effect of [Hit Me If You Can] activates, it lasts 3 seconds.

shackles.title: Emotion Resonance
shackles.description: Ultimate Energy Consumption is reduced by 3 points.

skills.name: Precision Revolver
skills.description: Roulecca fires her revolver, dealing (Attack*95%) Physical Damage each time.

skills.name: Lucky Roulette
skills.description: Roulecca loads 6 [Lucky Bullets]. Her next 6 attacks will be blessed with luck, each dealing (50%-225% of her Attack) Physical Damage.

skills.name: You're Dead Meat
skills.description:
Roulecca's Attack Speed is increased by 15%. Each [Lucky Bullet] has a 15% chance to increase [Lucky Bullet's] Crit Rate and Crit Damage. The effect can stack up to 3 times.

1 stack: 10% Crit Rate and 15% Crit Damage
2 stacks: 20% Crit Rate and 30% Crit Damage
3 stacks: 40% Crit Rate and 60% Crit Damage.

skills.name: Hit Me If You Can
skills.description: For every 6 [Lucky Bullets] fired, Roulecca reduces her next damage taken by 30%.

compliance: Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term, Attack +4, Defense +3
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 1, Attack +5, Defense +3
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 3, Unlock Requirements: Complete Roulecca's review
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term, Unlock Sticker
Unlock File: Supervision Record, Unlock Voice: Full Compliance, Unlock Sinner Title: Extreme Luck Maniac
supervision4:
++* ⚠⚠ Lucky Number

//Researchers attempt to study Roulecca's luck.//

**System Notifications:** In the Training Room, several researchers are attempting to test Roulecca's luck.

**Roulecca:** What did you say? What does it feel like when "the luck is there"? Roulecca doesn't know.

**Roulecca:** If I must describe it, it's kind of like a feeling of being really really sure about something, a feeling that something absolutely won't change, I guess?

**Roulecca:** Eh? You're here, Chief. Stay with Roulecca till I'm done with this experiment.

**Roulecca:** Quick! Think of a lucky number!

**Roulecca:** Have you decided? What is it? Don't say it out loud!

* **Prompt:** 7
 * **Roulecca:** Let me guess... The number you have in your mind is seven, isn't it?
 * **Roulecca:** Did Roulecca guess it right?
 * **System Notifications:** You nod, and the researchers all look amazed.
 * **Roulecca:** Hehe, this is a piece of cake to Roulecca.
 * **Roulecca:** Chief, you must remember this by heart. That's the lucky number for the two of us!
 * **Roulecca:** If you dare to forget, Roulecca is not going to forgive you.

* **Prompt:** "So boring."
 * **Roulecca:** Let me guess... The number you have in your mind is...
 * **Roulecca:** How strange, nothing feels right. Chief! You're not playing by the rules, are you?
 * **System Notifications:** To ensure the experiment's accuracy, the staff member asks you to say what's in your mind out loud.
 * **Prompt:** Tell the truth
 * **Roulecca:** Did you just say Roulecca was boring?! You're not getting away with this!
 * **Roulecca:** Take this! Roulecca's Bullet Punch!
 * **System Notifications:** It takes great effort for the staff to separate you from Roulecca who's throwing a tantrum.
supervision5:
++* ⚠⚠⚠ Four-Leaf Clover

//Roulecca has been staying by the flowerbed in the greenhouse alone for a long while.//

**System Notifications:** Attention, Sinner Roulecca has been staying by the flowerbed for over an hour. Go and check?

* **Prompt:** Go

**System Notifications:** You come next to Roulecca and find that she's staring at the new weeds in the flowerbed blankly.

**Chief:** What are you doing?

**Roulecca:** Ahh?! Who is it?! ...Oh, it's you.

**System Notifications:** Roulecca seems a little down.

**System Notifications:** You stare at the layer of green plants at the bottom of the flowerbed. They're new three-leaf clovers.

**System Notifications:** You remember Roulecca came from a small gang called Four-leaf Clover. Perhaps they remind her of her family.

* **Prompt:** Look for a four-leaf clover
 * **System Notifications:** You crouch down and search carefully in the bunch of three-leaf clovers, trying to spot a four-leaf clover among them.
 * **System Notifications:** Roulecca crouches down next to you as well.
 * **Roulecca:** Are you looking for a four-leaf clover? Idiot, how can someone with your luck find it?
 * **System Notifications:** Roulecca casually plucks a leaf from the bunch and hands the four-leaf clover to you.
 * **Roulecca:** Here. Happy now?
 * **Prompt:** Give the clover to Roulecca
 * **Roulecca:** Hey! What are you doing!?
 * **System Notifications:** You place the four-leaf clover in Roulecca's hair. The sudden move makes her blush.
 * **Chief:** Where there are three-leaf clovers, there are four-leaf clovers too. With your luck, you'll never miss one.
 * **Chief:** Perhaps that's how your family watches over you now.
 * **Roulecca:** I... You...
 * **System Notifications:** Roulecca bows her head, suddenly rendered speechless. She only rubs her eyes with the back of her hand.
 * **Roulecca:** Did you just make up that line to comfort me? That's cringy.
 * **Roulecca:** But still, thanks!
 * **System Notifications:** Roulecca runs off and makes a gun with her fingers, shooting at you twice. Bang, bang.
 * **Roulecca:** Idiot Chief!

* **Prompt:** Look for a three-leaf clover
 * **System Notifications:** You crouch down and pluck a three-leaf clover from the bunch.
 * **System Notifications:** Roulecca crouches down next to you as well.
 * **Roulecca:** Hey, are you an idiot or what? Look for a four-leaf clover, one with four leaves! A three-leaf clover is no sign of good luck.
 * **Prompt:** Give the clover to Roulecca
 * **System Notifications:** Hey! What are you doing!?
 * **System Notifications:** You place the three-leaf clover in Roulecca's hair. The sudden move makes her blush.
 * **Chief:** We don't have your luck, and we'll never replace your family.
 * **Chief:** But perhaps, we can watch over you as ordinary people.
 * **Roulecca:** You... You're the Sinners' boss, what's ordinary about that?
 * **System Notifications:** Roulecca turns her face to one side, kicking the ground casually with one foot.
 * **Roulecca:** People in the Bureau are all monsters like me.
 * **Roulecca:** In fact, we're all four-leaf clovers. It reassures me a bit to be with everyone here.
 * **System Notifications:** Roulecca hops off quickly, grimacing at you.
 * **Roulecca:** Idiot Chief! I'm not touched by what you said or anything. Everything I just told you is a lie!
 * **Roulecca:** Humph!

voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - EN: You're pretty lucky to have caught Roulecca! Wanna bet with Roulecca on something?
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - JP: ルリを捕まえられるなんて、あんた、運がいいね！あたしと何か賭けをしない？
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - KR: 로레카를 잡다니, 운이 좋은데? 로레카랑 내기해 볼래요?
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - CN: 居然能抓到露莉，你运气不错嘛！不如来和露莉玩点什么吧？反正……最后肯定是露莉赢！
voicelines.Obtain the Sinner - TW: 居然能抓到露莉，你運氣不錯嘛！來和露莉賭點什麼吧？
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - EN: Yay! Is today Roulecca's lucky day too?
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - JP: ラッキー！もしかして、今日もルリのラッキーデー？
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - CN: Lucky——难道今天也是露莉的幸运日吗？
voicelines.Raise to Phase 1 - TW: Lucky——難道今天也是露莉的幸運日嗎？
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - EN: Make a bigger bet. That's still not enough... Let's bet everyone's life on it!
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - JP: もっと大きな賭けをしようよ。それから……もっといっぱい賭けをしよう？一番ワクワクする賭け金は……みーんなの命とか！
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - KR: 더 크게 걸어, 더 크게~ 아예, 모두 목숨을 걸어버리자~!
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - CN: 嘻嘻……让游戏再刺激一点吧！最好……让所有人都知道露莉的厉害！
voicelines.Raise to Phase 3 - TW: 再賭大一點吧，多一點吧，最好……把所有人的命都賭上！
voicelines.Level Start - JP: ふんふんふん～、遊びに行こ——
voicelines.Win Battles - EN: Roulecca wants an even more thrilling game!
voicelines.Win Battles - JP: ルリはもぉっと刺激的な賭けがしたいの！
voicelines.Win Battles - KR: 로레카는 더 짜릿한 내기를 하고 싶어~

voicelines.Win Battles - TW: 露莉還想要更刺激的賭局呢——

voicelines.Lose Battles - CN: 输了？露莉居然输了？！哈哈，哈哈哈！
voicelines.Lose Battles - TW: 輸了？露莉居然輸了？！哈哈，哈哈哈！
voicelines.Ultimate Skill - JP: ははは、はっはっはっはっは！
voicelines.Die in Battles - EN: Finally... You've come to pick me up...
voicelines.Die in Battles - JP: やっと……迎えに来てくれた……。
voicelines.Greeting - EN: It's boring to be alone... Do you want to play a game with Roulecca?
voicelines.Greeting - JP: 一人はつまんないんだもん……ルリと何かして遊ばない？
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 혼자는 너무 심심하단 말이야, 국장님, 로레카랑 뭐하고 놀아줄 거예요?
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 一个人真的好无聊……局长要和露莉玩点什么吗？
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 一個人真的好無聊……局長要和露莉玩點什麼嗎？
voicelines.Conversation 1 - EN: Roulecca's heard a .45 bullet takes only 0.45 seconds to pass through the brain. Hmm... Who should Roulecca test it on?
voicelines.Conversation 1 - JP: 四十五口径の弾丸が頭を貫通するのにかかる時間は0.45秒なんだって。うーん……誰かに試してみる？
voicelines.Conversation 1 - KR: 45 구경의 총알이 머리를 관통하는데 필요한 시간이 고작 0.45초라는데, 음… 누구를 데려다 실험해 볼까나?
voicelines.Conversation 1 - CN: 听说点45的子弹穿过脑袋的时间只需要0.45秒，嗯……找谁来试一试呢？
voicelines.Conversation 1 - TW: 聽說點45的子彈穿過腦袋的時間只需要0.45秒，嗯……找誰來試一試呢？
voicelines.Conversation 2 - EN: You know, Roulecca is a super famous assassin. Skills? Strategies? Intel? Come on. Only luckless suckers need those things. Once someone's in Roulecca's crosshairs, there's no escaping their fate!
voicelines.Conversation 2 - JP: ルリは超有名な殺し屋だよ。テクニック？戦術？情報？そんなのが必要なのは運の悪いやつだけでしょ。ルリが目をつけたら、神様がやつを見逃さないんだもん！
voicelines.Conversation 2 - KR: 로레카는 엄~청 유명한 킬러에요. 기술? 전술? 정보? 재수 없는 녀석들이나 그런 게 필요하지. 일단 로레카 눈에 띄면 하늘이 가만두지 않는다고!
voicelines.Conversation 2 - CN: 技巧？战术？情报？嗨呀，倒霉蛋才需要那些东西。露莉盯上谁，老天就不会放过他！运气——才是露莉最强大的武器！
voicelines.Conversation 2 - TW: 露莉是超級有名的殺手哦。技巧？戰術？情報？唉呀，倒楣蛋才需要那些東西。露莉盯上誰，老天就不會放過他！
voicelines.Conversation 3 - EN: Growing up, Roulecca has never lost at any games. Roulecca doesn't need to cheat. Roulecca doesn't need to work hard either. Everyone just dotes on Roulecca—all the time. Right? Because you do too, don't you, Chief?
voicelines.Conversation 3 - JP: 子供の頃から、どんなゲームでも、ルリは負けたことがないんだぁ。ズルする必要もないし、努力する必要もない。みんながルリを超——可愛がってくれるから。局長、あんたもそうでしょう？
voicelines.Conversation 3 - KR: 어릴 때부터 어떤 게임도 로레카는 진 적이 없어요. 커닝을 하지 않아도, 노력을 하지 않아도, 왜냐하면 다들 로레카를 너~무 예뻐해 줬거든요. 그렇죠? 국장님, 국장님도 로레카가 너~무 예쁘지?
voicelines.Conversation 3 - CN: 从小到大，不管什么游戏，露莉都没输过呢。不用作弊，也不用努力，因为大家都超——级宠爱露莉。对吧？局长，你也是的吧？
voicelines.Conversation 3 - TW: 從小到大，不管什麼遊戲，露莉都沒輸過呢。不用作弊，也不用努力，因為大家都超——級寵愛露莉。對吧？局長，你也是的吧？
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - EN: Revenge is never Roulecca's purpose. Hehe, in fact, it's Roulecca's reason for living.
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - JP: 復讐はルリの目的じゃないよ。へへ、ルリが生きていく理由だもん。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - KR: 복수는 결코 로레카의 목적이 아니었어요. 헤헤, 로레카가 살아갈 이유였지.
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - CN: 复仇从来都不是露莉的目的，嘿嘿，是露莉活下去的理由哦。
voicelines.Special Conversation 1 - TW: 復仇從來都不是露莉的目的，嘿嘿，是露莉活下去的理由哦。
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - EN: Bombs, enemies, Black Water, cult followers, even those deadly monsters, Roulecca is not afraid of them! I'll dig out the truth behind everything.
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - JP: 爆弾も、敵も、ブラックウォーターも、カルトも、殺人モンスターも、ルリは恐くない！いつか黒幕を引きずり出してやるもん。
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - KR: 폭탄도, 적도, 무슨 블랙워터도, 사이비도, 사람을 죽이는 괴물도, 로레카는 두렵지 않아! 나는 배후에 있는 모든 것을 끄집어낼 거야.
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - CN: 炸弹也是，敌人也是，什么黑水、邪教徒、杀人的怪物，露莉都不怕！我会把背后的一切都揪出来。
voicelines.Special Conversation 2 - TW: 炸彈也是，敵人也是，什麼黑水、邪教徒、殺人的怪物，露莉都不怕！我會把背後的一切都揪出來。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - EN: Don't forget that Roulecca has placed a huge bet on you. You can't lose your life to someone else so easily.
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - JP: ルリはあんたにありったけのお金を賭けてるんだから、勝手に命を落としちゃダメ。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - KR: 로레카는 당신에게 베팅했다고! 그러니까 아무에게나 목숨을 잃지 마요.
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - CN: 露莉可是在你身上下了重注的，不要随随便便把命输给别人。
voicelines.Special Conversation 3 - TW: 露莉可是在你身上下了重注的，不要隨隨便便把命輸給別人。
voicelines.Full Compliance - EN: Roulecca found another four-leaf clover! Hmm, with your terrible luck, Roulecca fears you'll never spot one in your whole life. Alright... Take this one. In return, play with Roulecca for a bit more.
voicelines.Full Compliance - JP: また四つ葉のクローバー見つけちゃった！ふふ、局長ほど運が悪いと、きっと一生に1本だって見つけられないよね。いいや……これはあげる。その代わり、もう少しルリと遊んでね。
voicelines.Full Compliance - KR: 로레카가 또 네잎 클로버를 찾았어! 헤헤, 국장님처럼 운이 나쁜 사람은 아마 평생 하나도 못 찾을걸. 됐어…이건 국장님한테 줄게요, 보답으로 국장은 로레카랑 더 많이 놀아줘야 해.
voicelines.Full Compliance - CN: 露莉又找到四叶草了！哼哼，像局长运气这么差的人，恐怕这辈子都找不到一株吧。算了…这株就送给你吧，作为回报，局长要再多陪露莉玩一会儿。
voicelines.Full Compliance - TW: 露莉又找到四葉草了！哼哼，像局長運氣這麼差的人，恐怕這輩子都找不到一株吧。算了…這株就送給你吧，作為回報，局長要再多陪露莉玩一會兒。
voicelines.Annoyed - EN: You seem bored. Do you want to play a game with Roulecca? Why don't we—bet on this?
voicelines.Annoyed - JP: 局長、暇なの？ルリと遊びたい？じゃあ——これで賭けしてみない？
voicelines.Annoyed - KR: 국장님, 되게 한가한가 봐. 로레카랑 놀래요? 예를 들어~~ 이거 내기할까요?
voicelines.Annoyed - CN: 局长看起来好闲呀，要和露莉玩点什么吗？比如——猜猜弹巢里有几颗子弹？
voicelines.Annoyed - TW: 局長好閒呀，是想找露莉玩點什麼嗎？比如——這個？
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: Wow, have you come to play with Roulecca?
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: あっ、局長、ルリと一緒に遊ぶ？
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 오오오~ 국장님 로레카랑 놀아주러 온 거야?
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 哦哦，局长要来陪露莉玩了吗？
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 哦哦，局長要來陪露莉玩了嗎？
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - EN: Roulecca is back! Roulecca didn't wander off this time.
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - JP: ルリが帰ってきたよ！今回は走り回ってないもん。
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - KR: 로레카 다녀왔어요~! 오늘은 여기저기 돌아다니지 않고 곧장 돌아왔어요~!
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - CN: 露莉回来啦！这次露莉没有到处乱跑哦。
voicelines.Dispatch Complete - TW: 露莉回來啦！這次露莉沒有到處亂跑哦。
voicelines.Level Up - EN: Eh? Roulecca can get even stronger?
voicelines.Level Up - JP: え？ルリってばもっと強くなれるの——？
voicelines.Level Up - KR: 에? 로레카가 더 강해질 수 있었단 말이야~?
voicelines.Level Up - CN: 诶？原来露莉还能变强的呀——
voicelines.Level Up - TW: 咦？原來露莉還能變強的呀——
voicelines.Pat Head - EN: Stop ruffling my hair! I'm not a little kid! Waaa—cut it out!
voicelines.Pat Head - JP: 頭を触らないで！子供じゃないもん！わあああやめてよ！
voicelines.Pat Head - KR: 머리 만지기 없기! 난 어린애가 아니에요! 으악! 멈춰!
voicelines.Pat Head - CN: 不许摸头！我又不是小孩子！哇啊啊啊住手！
voicelines.Pat Head - TW: 不許摸頭！我又不是小孩子！哇啊啊啊住手！

voicelines.Attire Obtained - EN: Pew pew! Hehe, did I scare you, Chief? It's just a water gun! Come and play with Roulecca!
voicelines.Attire Obtained - JP: バンバンバン——！へへっ、びっくりした？これは水鉄砲だよ、局長！早くルリと一緒に遊ぼうよ！
voicelines.Attire Obtained - KR: 탕탕탕~! 에헤헤, 깜짝 놀랐죠? 물총이었어요, 국장님! 어서 와서 로레카랑 같이 놀아요!
voicelines.Attire Obtained - CN: biubiubiu——！嘿嘿，吓了一跳吗？这是水枪啦局长！快来跟露莉一起玩呀！
voicelines.Attire Obtained - TW: biubiubiu——！嘿嘿，嚇了一跳嗎？這是水槍啦局長！快來跟露莉一起玩呀！
voicelines.Greeting - EN: Chief—Are you ready to gamble with Roulecca today? Whoever loses has to buy three melon popsicles!
voicelines.Greeting - JP: 局長——ルリとの勝負、ちゃんと準備できた？負けた方はメロンアイス三つ奢りだからね！
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 국장님~ 로레카와의 내기는 잘 준비해왔죠? 진 사람이 아이스크림 세 개 사기에요!
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 局长——今天有认真准备好和露莉的赌局么？输的人可是要买三份蜜瓜冰棍！
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 局長——今天有認真準備好和露莉的賭局嗎？輸的人就要買三份哈密瓜冰棒！
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - EN: Roulecca loves to play on Eirene's big ship. The people there won't get angry even if I win a lot of things from them, and they always rush over to take pictures with me. They keep saying "the god of gambling is alive" and what not... I really don't understand them.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - JP: エイレーネーの大きな船に遊びに行くの、大好き！あそこの人、ルリがたくさん勝っちゃっても怒らないし、ルリと写真を撮りたがるの。「ギャンブルの神」とか言って……なんかよくわかんない。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - KR: 로레카는 이리나의 커다란 크루즈에서 노는 게 좋아요. 거기 사람들은 내가 아무리 많이 따가도 화내지 않거든요. 오히려 자꾸 로레카랑 사진을 찍으려 해요. '도박왕'이라나 뭐라나… 정말 이상한 사람들이라니까요.
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - CN: 露莉很喜欢去伊琳娜的那艘大船上玩，那里的人就算是被赢走了好多好多东西也不会生气，而且他们还会冲过来和露莉合影。说是什么“赌王在世”……真是搞不懂这群家伙。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - TW: 露莉很喜歡去伊琳娜的那艘大船上玩，那裡的人就算是被贏走了好多好多東西也不會生氣，而且他們還會衝過來和露莉合影。說是什麼「賭王再世」……真是搞不懂這群傢伙。
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - EN: Lucky—I won so many cakes today! I'm so happy! However, many others also gave Roulecca dessert before, but... who were they? Hmm... darn, Roulecca can't remember...
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - JP: ラッキー！今日もこんなにいっぱいケーキ勝ち取っちゃった！嬉しい！でも、なんだか、昔も色んな人からスイーツをもらった気がするの。あの人たち……誰だっけ？うーん……どうしよう、よく思い出せないの……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - KR: 럭키~ 오늘 케이크를 엄청 따냈어요! 근데 그전에도 사람들이 자꾸 로레카한테 디저트를 선물해 주곤 했어요. 그게… 누구였더라? 우웅… 아이쿠, 로레카 기억이 안 나요…
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - CN: Lucky——今天又赢了这么多蛋糕，好开心！不过，之前有许多人也会送甜点给露莉吃，是……是谁来着？嗯……糟糕，露莉想不起来了……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - TW: Lucky——今天又贏了這麼多蛋糕，好開心！不過，之前有許多人也會送甜點給露莉吃，是……是誰來著？嗯……糟糕，露莉想不起來了……
voicelines.Idle - EN: Mmmm—what lovely weather! Chief, why don't you come and play something with me? Surfing, beachball—you name it! Roulecca is down with anything!
voicelines.Idle - JP: うーん、いい天気。局長、何か遊んでくれない？サーフィンでも、バレーボールでも、ルリはなんでもいいよ！
voicelines.Idle - KR: 와아~ 날씨가 너무 좋아요. 국장님, 얼른 와서 로레카랑 놀아줘요! 서핑이나, 비치 발리볼도 좋고, 뭐든 괜찮아요!
voicelines.Idle - CN: 嗯——好棒的天气。局长不来和露莉玩点什么游戏么？不管是冲浪，还是沙滩排球，露莉都可以！
voicelines.Idle - TW: 嗯——好棒的天氣。局長不來和露莉玩點什麼遊戲嗎？不管是衝浪，還是沙灘排球，露莉都可以！
voicelines.Annoyed - EN: Haha... Chief, so itchy! Ahhh—Roulecca can't lose!
voicelines.Annoyed - JP: あはははは……局長、くすぐったいよ！もうールリも負けないんだから！
voicelines.Annoyed - KR: 아하핫… 국장님, 간지러워요! 앗~ 로레카도 질 수 없어!
voicelines.Annoyed - CN: 哈哈……局长，好痒啊！啊——露莉也不能输！
voicelines.Annoyed - TW: 哈哈……局長，好癢啊！啊——露莉也不能輸！
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: Chief... why do you keep staring at me? Is it because you like my shark doll, too? Hmph! This is Roulecca's hard-won prize! I won't lend it to you!
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: 局長……なんでルリのことじっと見てるの？うーん、もしかして……局長もサメのぬいぐるみが好きなの？でも、これはルリが勝ち取ったものだから、貸してあげないもん！
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 국장님… 로레카를 왜 그렇게 빤히 쳐다보는 거예요? 설마… 국장님도 로레카의 상어 인형을 탐내는 거예요? 흥, 이건 로레카도 어렵게 따낸 거거든요, 절대 안 빌려줄 거예요!
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 局长……你怎么一直在盯着露莉呀。难道说……局长也喜欢露莉的鲨鱼玩偶么？哼，这可是露莉好不容易赢来的东西，才不会借给你躺！
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 局長……你怎麼一直在盯著露莉呀。難道說……局長也喜歡露莉的鯊魚玩偶嗎？哼，這可是露莉好不容易贏來的東西，才不會借給你躺！
voicelines.Level Up - EN: Roulecca is going to win more ice cream!
voicelines.Level Up - JP: ルリが勝ったら、もっともっとアイスをくれる？
voicelines.Level Up - KR: 로레카가 아이스크림을 더, 더, 더~ 많이 따낼 거예요!
voicelines.Level Up - CN: 露莉要赢更多更多的冰淇淋！
voicelines.Level Up - TW: 露莉要贏更多更多的冰淇淋！

voicelines.Attire Obtained - EN: Roulecca ate a strange cake this morning and turned into this. Um, Summer put it there on the table, I guess. It looked so delicious! I couldn't help myself... Hehe...
voicelines.Attire Obtained - JP: 今朝、変なケーキを食べたらこうなっちゃったんだ。えーっと……夏音おねえちゃんがテーブルに置いたらしいんだけど、美味しそうだったから……ルリ、我慢できなくて……えへへ……
voicelines.Attire Obtained - KR: 로레카가 오늘 아침에 이상한 케이크를 먹었더니 이렇게 변해버렸어요. 음… 여름 언니가 테이블 위에 놓아둔 것 같은데, 너무 맛있어 보이길래… 로레카가 참지 못하고… 헤헤…
voicelines.Attire Obtained - CN: 露莉今天早上吃了一块奇怪的蛋糕就变成这样了，嗯……好像是夏音姐姐放在桌子上的，因为看起来实在太好吃了……露莉就没忍住……嘿嘿……
voicelines.Attire Obtained - TW: 露莉今天早上吃了一塊奇怪的蛋糕就變成這樣了，嗯……好像是夏音姐姐放在桌子上的，因為看起來實在太好吃了……露莉就沒忍住……嘿嘿……
voicelines.Greeting - EN: Hide-and-seek? No, thank you. Don't assume I want to play such childish games just because Roulecca has become smaller, okay? Or, I have a better idea... How about I hide in your embrace?
voicelines.Greeting - JP: かくれんぼ？ヤダ……ルリが小さくなったからって、そんな子供っぽい遊びさせないでよ！それとも、ルリを局長の腕の中に隠す？
voicelines.Greeting - KR: 숨바꼭질이요? 안 할래요… 로레카가 작아졌다고 해서 로레카와 이런 유치한 게임을 하면 안 되죠! 그럼, 로레카가 국장님 품에 숨어 있어도 돼요?
voicelines.Greeting - CN: 捉迷藏？我不要……不能因为露莉身体变小了就跟露莉玩这么幼稚的游戏呀！或者，局长你让露莉躲到你怀里怎么样？
voicelines.Greeting - TW: 捉迷藏？我不要……不能因為露莉身體變小了就跟露莉玩這麼幼稚的遊戲呀！或者，局長你讓露莉躲到你懷裡怎麼樣？
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - EN: Aw... No snacks before bed? One bite, just one bite, okay? Roulecca is a lucky girl so I won't get tooth decay! I assure you!
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - JP: え……？寝る前に……お菓子を食べちゃダメなの？ひ……一口だけ！ルリは運がいいから虫歯にならないよ！うん！
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - KR: 어…? 자기 전에… 간식 먹으면 안 돼요? 하… 한 입만 먹을게요! 로레카에겐 행운이 따르니까 충치는 생기지 않을 거예요! 응!
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - CN: 啊……？睡前……不可以吃零食么？就……就吃一口！露莉那么幸运一定不会有蛀牙的！嗯！
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 1 - TW: 啊……？睡前……不可以吃零食嗎？就……就吃一口！露莉那麼幸運一定不會有蛀牙的！嗯！
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - EN: Hmmm... Roulecca is tired. Chief, can you get Roulecca some teddy bears? I want to hug them as I fall asleep, like when I was little...
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - JP: んー……ルリ、ちょっと眠くなっちゃった……局長、クマちゃんのぬいぐるみ、いくつか取ってきてくれる？……小さい時みたいに、抱き締めて寝たいんだ……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - KR: 음… 로레카는 조금 졸려요… 국장님, 로레카한테 곰 인형 좀 갖다줄래요? 로레카는 어릴 때처럼 인형을 꼬옥 안고 자고 싶어요…
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - CN: 嗯……露莉有点困了……局长可以帮露莉拿几个小熊玩偶吗……露莉要像小时候一样抱着它们睡觉……
voicelines.Ordinary Contact 2 - TW: 嗯……露莉有點睏了……局長可以幫露莉拿幾個小熊玩偶嗎……露莉要像小時候一樣抱著它們睡覺……
voicelines.Idle - EN: If I had been as strong back then as I am now, I would have been able to defeat them all even with this gun.
voicelines.Idle - JP: あの時のルリもこんなに強かったら……この銃だけであいつら全員殺せたのに！
voicelines.Idle - KR: 그때의 로레카가 지금처럼 강했다면 좋았을 텐데… 그랬다면 이 총만으로도 그 녀석들을 다 해치워 버릴 수 있었을 거예요!
voicelines.Idle - CN: 如果当时露莉有现在这么强就好了……就算用这把枪也能把那些家伙们统统干掉！
voicelines.Idle - TW: 如果當時露莉有現在這麼強就好了……就算用這把槍也能把那些傢伙們統統幹掉！
voicelines.Annoyed - EN: Do not treat Roulecca like a kid! Roulecca may be smaller now, but I am as clever as ever! Beating you will be easy as pie. Take that! Pew pew pew pew pew!
voicelines.Annoyed - JP: ルリを子供扱いしないで！身体は小さくなったけど、頭の良さは変わらないんだから！局長に勝つのも簡単だよ！食らえ！バンバンバン！
voicelines.Annoyed - KR: 로레카를 애 취급하지 마세요! 로레카는 키가 작아졌지만, 여전히 똑똑하다고요! 국장님을 가뿐하게 이길 수 있어요! 이얍! 빵야빵야빵야!
voicelines.Annoyed - CN: 不许把露莉当小孩子！虽然露莉的身体变小了，但头脑还是很聪明的！赢下局长轻轻松松！看招！Biubiubiubiubiu！
voicelines.Annoyed - TW: 不許把露莉當小孩子！雖然露莉的身體變小了，但頭腦還是很聰明的！贏下局長輕輕鬆鬆！看招！Biubiubiubiubiu！
voicelines.Special Attention - EN: Hehe, doesn't this outfit look good on me, Chief? As one of my family, you should compliment me, too!
voicelines.Special Attention - JP: ふふん、この服ルリに似合ってると思わない？ルリの家族として、局長も褒めてよ！
voicelines.Special Attention - KR: 흠흠~ 로레카가 이렇게 입으니까 잘 어울리죠? 국장님은 로레카의 가족으로서 로레카를 칭찬해 줘야 해요!
voicelines.Special Attention - CN: 哼哼，是不是觉得露莉这一身特别合适呀~作为露莉的家人，局长也要来夸夸露莉！
voicelines.Special Attention - TW: 哼哼，是不是覺得露莉這一身特別合適呀~作為露莉的家人，局長也要來誇誇露莉！
voicelines.Level Up - EN: I feel like I've grown taller again!
voicelines.Level Up - JP: ルリ、また背が伸びたような気がする！
voicelines.Level Up - KR: 로레카가 키가 더 커진 것 같아요!
voicelines.Level Up - CN: 露莉感觉自己又长高了！
voicelines.Level Up - TW: 露莉感覺自己又長高了！
